title: Market research analysts
snippet: We are looking for 2-3 freelancers to conduct market research for a 1-2 week period starting immediately. This job is to research 1000 practice websites in the UK and record the relevant data into a spreadsheet. We will provide the spreadsheet with the names of the companies who's websites need to be researched, as well as the guide for the data that needs to be filled in to the spreadsheet. Further details can be given upon applicant request. A bonus for high performance and early delivery to be discussed. Candidates must be fluent in English.
